reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major bunyavirus infections: Hantavirus (~5 per 100k in endemic regions, globally ~0.5), Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever (~2-3), Rift Valley fever (~10 in outbreak years, baseline ~1), Phlebovirus (~5), other bunyaviruses (~20-30).
